_comment_1: AppDefaultAdminPassword must be minimum of 6 characters with at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one numeric and one alphanumeric character
_comment_2: When AppSecure is true, all links or redirects will be generated using https scheme, http otherwise

ConnectionStrings.DefaultConnection: Data Source=[give your machine name];Initial Catalog=TodoApp;User ID=sa; Password=[give your SQL instance password]
